OperatingHours.name: OperatingHours
OperatingHours.description: Represents the hours in which a service territory, service resource, or account is available for work in Salesforce Scheduler.

Description.description: The description of the operating hours. Add any details that arenâ€™t included in the name.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the operating hours record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the operating hours record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the operating hours. For example, Summer Hours, Winter Hours, or Peak Season Hours.

TimeZone.description: The time zone that the operating hours fall within.
